sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SAML2MetaDataGenerator</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Update On : 18-DEC-2018

This new script_include is an interface to call to call the OpenSAMLV3 based script includes.

1. First we call saveFormData(), which take sso_id and form serialized fields, it resolves (form fields take precedence) and then save it in session.
Please see respective implementations for details.

2. generateMetaData() - Called from saml2meta.do and it will use the session stored properties record to prepare the metadata.
---------</description>
        <name>SAML2MetaDataGenerator</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include('GenerateSaml2MetaDatav2');

var SAML2MetaDataGenerator = Class.create();
SAML2MetaDataGenerator.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor , {

	isMultiSSOV2Enabled: function() {
		return SNC.GlideMultiSSO.isMultiSSOv2();
	},

	saveFormData: function() {
		gs.info('SAML2MetaDataGenerator:saveFormData() - MultiSSO V2 is enabled');
		var sso_id = this.getParameter("sysparm_sys_id");
		var serializedFields = this.getParameter('sysparm_form_fields');
		SNC.GlideMultiSSO.logDebug(this.type + ':saveFormData() - Received sso_id = {' + sso_id +'}, serializedFields = {' + serializedFields + '}');
		new GenerateSaml2MetaDatav2().saveFormData(sso_id, serializedFields);
	},

	generateMetaData : function() {
		gs.info('SAML2MetaDataGenerator:generateMetaData() - MultiSSO V2 is enabled');
		var result = this.newItem("result");
		try {
			var sso_id = this.getParameter(SNC.SSOUtils.SSOID());
			gs.info('generateMetaData() - sso_id received is, ' + sso_id);
			var metadata = new GenerateSaml2MetaDatav2().generateMetaData(sso_id);
			result.setAttribute('status', 'success');
			result.setAttribute('message', metadata);
		} catch(e) {
			result.setAttribute('status', 'failed');
			result.setAttribute('message', e.message);
		}
		SNC.GlideMultiSSO.logDebug(this.type + ":generateMetaData() final result = {" + result.getAttribute('status') + "}, message = {" + result.getAttribute('message') + '}');
		return result;
	},

    type: 'SAML2MetaDataGenerator'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-12-18 11:25:45</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8b1906c473222300e8fa0dd43cf6a76f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>76</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SAML2MetaDataGenerator</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Integration - Multiple Provider Single Sign-On (do not activate...use 'Integration - Multiple Provid" source="com.snc.integration.sso.multi">4762a9692fe21110d8a4d5f62799b613</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8b1906c473222300e8fa0dd43cf6a76f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-01-16 09:21:05</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1485</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
